metadata.title: Test Variants – Phase 2 Autofit Demonstration
metadata.description: Test brand demonstrating Phase 2 variant system with manual overrides and autofit logic.

hero.title: Phase 2 Variant System Test
hero.subtitle: This test brand demonstrates manual variant overrides (longform, compact, grid, minimal) and autofit logic.

highlights.title: Variant Testing
highlights.subtitle: This section demonstrates the highlights feature.

seller.title: Seller Section (Longform Variant)
seller.subtitle: This section has variant: 'longform' explicitly set. It should use ContentLongform.astro with generous vertical spacing.

items.title: Extended Content Test
items.description:
This is a long description to test the longform variant.

• Multiple paragraphs with bullets
• Generous spacing between items
• Leading-relaxed text treatment

The longform variant is designed for extended text content with multiple items and structured formatting.

investor.title: Investor Section (Compact Variant)
investor.subtitle: This section has variant: 'compact' explicitly set. It should use ContentCompact.astro with minimal spacing.

items.title: Compact Layout
items.description: Tight spacing, smaller text, minimal vertical padding.

regions.title: Regions (Grid-2 Variant)
regions.subtitle: This section has variant: 'grid-2' set. It should display in a 2-column grid.

services.title: Services (Compact Variant)
services.subtitle: This section has variant: 'compact' set. It should use Features2Compact.astro with reduced spacing.

about.title: About Section (No Override - Autofit)
about.subtitle: This section has NO variant override. Autofit logic will select default variant based on content characteristics.

items.title: Autofit Selection
items.description:
The autofit system analyzes:
• Text density (short/normal/long)
• Content signals (bullets, paragraphs)
• Item count
• Media presence

Based on these signals, it selects the appropriate variant automatically.

cta.title: CTA (Minimal Variant)
cta.subtitle: This section has variant: 'minimal' set. No border, no shadow, simple design.

contact.title: Contact (Minimal Variant)
contact.subtitle: This section has variant: 'minimal' set. It should use ContactMinimal.astro (form only, no info panel).
